reviewtext: Great Buy. At first i thought I was getting a peace of junk. I have tested this camera several times a day. I have found it to be very usefull for targets that are a little ways out there. I have gone to Freeport, Bahamas and took great pictures with this lens. I am kindaa new to this lens. I have liked taking picture since I was 14 years old and now my hobbie is Photography!
